values.author: Queen Elizabeth II

values.authorQuote: At Christmas, I am always struck by how the spirit of togetherness lies also at the heart of the Christmas story. A young mother and a dutiful father with their baby were joined by poor shepherds and visitors from afar. They came with their gifts to worship the Christ child.
values.author: Queen Elizabeth II

values.authorQuote: My husband has quite simply been my strength and stay all these years, and I owe him a debt greater than he would ever claim.
values.author: Queen Elizabeth II

values.authorQuote: I have been aware all the time that my peoples, spread far and wide throughout every continent and ocean in the world, were united to support me in the task to which I have now been dedicated with such solemnity.
values.author: Queen Elizabeth II

values.authorQuote: I have to be seen to be believed.
values.author: Queen Elizabeth II

values.authorQuote: For many, Christmas is also a time for coming together. But for others, service will come first.
values.author: Queen Elizabeth II

values.authorQuote: I myself prefer my New Zealand eggs for breakfast.
values.author: Queen Elizabeth II

values.authorQuote: There is nothing in a caterpillar that tells you it's going to be a butterfly.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: Integrity is the essence of everything successful.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: Pollution is nothing but the resources we are not harvesting. We allow them to disperse because we've been ignorant of their value.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: When I am working on a problem, I never think about beauty but when I have finished, if the solution is not beautiful, I know it is wrong.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: One in ten thousand of us can make a technological breakthrough capable of supporting all the rest. The youth of today are absolutely right in recognizing this nonsense of earning a wage.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: A designer is an emerging synthesis of artist, inventor, mechanic, objective economist and evolutionary strategist.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: People should think things out fresh and not just accept conventional terms and the conventional way of doing things.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: I'm not a genius. I'm just a tremendous bundle of experience.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: Love is metaphysical gravity.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: I just invent, then wait until man comes around to needing what I've invented.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: How often I found where I should be going only by setting out for somewhere else.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: Don't fight forces, use them.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: God is a verb, not a noun.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: My ideas have undergone a process of emergence by emergency. When they are needed badly enough, they are accepted.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: What usually happens in the educational process is that the faculties are dulled, overloaded, stuffed and paralyzed so that by the time most people are mature they have lost their innate capabilities.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: Nature is trying very hard to make us succeed, but nature does not depend on us. We are not the only experiment.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: I look for what needs to be done. After all, that's how the universe designs itself.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: Sometimes I think we're alone. Sometimes I think we're not. In either case, the thought is staggering.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: Dictators never invent their own opportunities.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: Parents are usually more careful to bestow knowledge on their children rather than virtue, the art of speaking well rather than doing well; but their manners should be of the greatest concern.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: We are called to be architects of the future, not its victims.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: Let architects sing of aesthetics that bring Rich clients in hordes to their knees; Just give me a home, in a great circle dome Where stresses and strains are at ease.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: The end move in politics is always to pick up a gun.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: Great nations are simply the operating fronts of behind-the-scenes, vastly ambitious individuals who had become so effectively powerful because of their ability to remain invisible while operating behind the national scenery.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: Ninety-nine percent of who you are is invisible and untouchable.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: We are not going to be able to operate our Spaceship Earth successfully nor for much longer unless we see it as a whole spaceship and our fate as common. It has to be everybody or nobody.
values.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

values.authorQuote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: Let your life lightly dance on the edges of Time like dew on the tip of a leaf.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: The butterfly counts not months but moments, and has time enough.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: Depth of friendship does not depend on length of acquaintance.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: By plucking her petals, you do not gather the beauty of the flower.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: Trees are the earth's endless effort to speak to the listening heaven.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: Don't limit a child to your own learning, for he was born in another time.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: Death is not extinguishing the light; it is only putting out the lamp because the dawn has come.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: Love does not claim possession, but gives freedom.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: Let us not pray to be sheltered from dangers but to be fearless when facing them.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: Everything comes to us that belongs to us if we create the capacity to receive it.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: The flower which is single need not envy the thorns that are numerous.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: I have become my own version of an optimist. If I can't make it through one door, I'll go through another door - or I'll make a door. Something terrific will come no matter how dark the present.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: The water in a vessel is sparkling; the water in the sea is dark. The small truth has words which are clear; the great truth has great silence.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: The highest education is that which does not merely give us information but makes our life in harmony with all existence.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: Age considers; youth ventures.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: Music fills the infinite between two souls.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: Trees are Earth's endless effort to speak to the listening heaven.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: We come nearest to the great when we are great in humility.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: Nirvana is not the blowing out of the candle. It is the extinguishing of the flame because day is come.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: Love is an endless mystery, for it has nothing else to explain it.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: He who is too busy doing good finds no time to be good.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: We live in the world when we love it.
values.author: Rabindranath Tagore
values.authorOccupation: Writer, song composer, playwright, essayist, painter

values.authorQuote: The only journey is the one within.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: Live your questions now, and perhaps even without knowing it, you will live along some distant day into your answers.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: If your daily life seems poor, do not blame it; blame yourself that you are not poet enough to call forth its riches; for the Creator, there is no poverty.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: Spring has returned. The Earth is like a child that knows poems.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: Love consists in this, that two solitudes protect and touch and greet each other.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: One had to take some action against fear when once it laid hold of one.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: No great art has ever been made without the artist having known danger.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: Perhaps all the dragons of our lives are princesses who are only waiting to see us once beautiful and brave.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: It is good to be solitary, for solitude is difficult; that something is difficult must be a reason the more for us to do it.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: The purpose of life is to be defeated by greater and greater things.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: There are so many things about which some old man ought to tell one while one is little; for when one is grown one would know them as a matter of course.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: The future enters into us, in order to transform itself in us, long before it happens.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: Perhaps everything terrible is in its deepest being something helpless that wants help from us.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: All emotions are pure which gather you and lift you up; that emotion is impure which seizes only one side of your being and so distorts you.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: More belongs to marriage than four legs in a bed.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: Once the realization is accepted that even between the closest human beings infinite distances continue, a wonderful living side by side can grow, if they succeed in loving the distance between them which makes it possible for each to see the other whole against the sky.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: I want to be with those who know secret things or else alone.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: There may be good, but there are no pleasant marriages.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: Let life happen to you. Believe me: life is in the right, always.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: For one human being to love another; that is perhaps the most difficult of all our tasks, the ultimate, the last test and proof, the work for which all other work is but preparation.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: Everything is blooming most recklessly; if it were voices instead of colors, there would be an unbelievable shrieking into the heart of the night.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: Believe that with your feelings and your work you are taking part in the greatest; the more strongly you cultivate this belief, the more will reality and the world go forth from it.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: I hold this to be the highest task for a bond between two people: that each protects the solitude of the other.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: And now we welcome the new year. Full of things that have never been.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: There are quantities of human beings, but there are many more faces, for each person has several.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: The deepest experience of the creator is feminine, for it is experience of receiving and bearing.
values.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
values.authorBirthname: René Karl Wilhelm Johann Josef Maria Rilke

values.authorQuote: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: For every minute you remain angry, you give up sixty seconds of peace of mind.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: The earth laughs in flowers.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: The sky is the daily bread of the eyes.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising up every time we fail.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: You cannot do a kindness too soon, for you never know how soon it will be too late.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: Men are what their mothers made them.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: Once you make a decision, the universe conspires to make it happen.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us or we find it not.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: Never lose an opportunity of seeing anything beautiful, for beauty is God's handwriting.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: Unless you try to do something beyond what you have already mastered, you will never grow.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: Beauty without expression is boring.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: Common sense is genius dressed in its working clothes.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: What is a weed? A plant whose virtues have never been discovered.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: The first wealth is health.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: Bad times have a scientific value. These are occasions a good learner would not miss.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: The reason why the world lacks unity, and lies broken and in heaps, is, because man is disunited with himself.
values.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

values.authorQuote: Jump, and you will find out how to unfold your wings as you fall.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: There are worse crimes than burning books. One of them is not reading them.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: Living at risk is jumping off the cliff and building your wings on the way down.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: After Hiroshima was bombed, I saw a photograph of the side of a house with the shadows of the people who had lived there burned into the wall from the intensity of the bomb. The people were gone, but their shadows remained.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: Science fiction is any idea that occurs in the head and doesn't exist yet, but soon will, and will change everything for everybody, and nothing will ever be the same again. As soon as you have an idea that changes some small part of the world you are writing science fiction. It is always the art of the possible, never the impossible.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: I hate all politics. I don't like either political party. One should not belong to them - one should be an individual, standing in the middle. Anyone that belongs to a party stops thinking.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: You must stay drunk on writing so reality cannot destroy you.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: Collecting facts is important. Knowledge is important. But if you don't have an imagination to use the knowledge, civilization is nowhere.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: Video games are a waste of time for men with nothing else to do. Real brains don't do that.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: In my later years, I have looked in the mirror each day and found a happy person staring back. Occasionally I wonder why I can be so happy. The answer is that every day of my life I've worked only for myself and for the joy that comes from writing and creating. The image in my mirror is not optimistic, but the result of optimal behavior.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: We are cups, constantly and quietly being filled. The trick is, knowing how to tip ourselves over and let the beautiful stuff out.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: The great fun in my life has been getting up every morning and rushing to the typewriter because some new idea has hit me.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: When you're older you want to learn from other people.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: I discovered me in the library. I went to find me in the library.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: We are an impossibility in an impossible universe.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: Love. Fall in love and stay in love. Write only what you love, and love what you write. The key word is love. You have to get up in the morning and write something you love, something to live for.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: If God treats you well by teaching you a disastrous lesson, you never forget it.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: The answer I found is you stay away from the people who make fun of you, and you join these ad hoc groups who understand your craziness.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: Every morning I jump out of bed and step on a landmine. The landmine is me. After the explosion, I spent the rest of the day putting the pieces together.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: I love all of the arts. I love motion pictures. I love stage. I love theater.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: Journalism keeps you planted in the earth.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: I don't try to describe the future. I try to prevent it.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: There is too much government today. We've got to remember the government should be by the people, of the people, and for the people.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: I know you've heard it a thousand times before. But it's true - hard work pays off. If you want to be good, you have to practice, practice, practice. If you don't love something, then don't do it.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: If you don't like what you're doing, then don't do it.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: I've been afraid of people playing their life away with too many toys.
values.author: Ray Bradbury

values.authorQuote: As a general rule, if you are prone to melodramatic meltdowns, please avoid purchasing a webcam for any reason.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: I was influenced by a lot of stand-up comedians... Eddie Murphy back when he was doing 'Raw.' I watched that so many times as a kid, I can probably still quote the entire thing to this day. Chris Rock. Dave Chappelle. George Carlin. A lot of the guys who were sort of edgy for their time.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: My success has been something I've worked a long time at and it's been a gradual process. I compare it to the idea of someone losing a lot of weight over a period of a few years. You don't really notice the weight loss overall but if you compare photos from then and now there's a big difference.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: Maybe someday, if I work hard enough, entertainment will be a career for me, but right now making videos and uploading them to the Internet is just a hobby.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: Never angrily rant into your web cam. While smashing a keyboard in half over a game of 'World of Warcraft' may seem totally justified in your head, to the rest of the known universe you look like a raging psychopath.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: One of the amazing things about the Internet is that the content creators are the gatekeepers. We can think of an idea and execute it quickly, and we didn't have to pitch the idea to a major network or convince a studio head to sign-off on the concept.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: I not only hope that YouTube channels compete with television shows for viewers and revenue, I hope they develop a bitter rivalry which could only be settled by an elaborate medieval tournament where the two entities fight to the death in a steel cage.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: At the end of the day, a television, a computer, or a smart phone is just a device through which one can access content. The content itself is what matters, not the device.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: Human beings don't want to just enjoy something by themselves. They want to share that emotion - they want everyone around them to enjoy it like they enjoy it or hate it like they hate it. That's what makes a video spread.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: What really shocks me, what I can honestly sit back and ponder for hours in a lot of cases is just, 'Why would you film yourself doing that? Who put you up to that? What are you getting out of that?'
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: I'm motivated by entertaining people.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: Sometimes, comedy and entertainment is not all about telling jokes; sometimes you just have to be you for a few moments.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: I try to have fun; I try to inject myself into my work and have a good time along the way and not lose sight of who I am, and who my friends are, and all of these things that treating it like a business might hinder. I try to keep that hobby mentality.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: I enjoy what I do, but I also do it on time because my audience is very pervasive; they're everywhere, and they will constantly remind me if I'm not on time.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: In fall 2007, I stood at the midway point of completing my undergraduate studies at Columbia. I studied every moment that I wasn't sitting in class. I was very focused on maintaining a solid GPA, so I could go on to law school.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: During my long study sessions in the library, I found myself watching YouTube videos during study breaks.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: For almost a year, I sporadically made these rather lame video blogs in my dorm. These video blogs were reflective of most video blogs during that time in that they had no real structure and were kind of just all over the place.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: I run advertisements and sell T-shirts to cover overhead costs and pay the few people who help me out behind the scenes. Anything left over is spent on production costs, animation costs, etc.
values.author: Ray William Johnson
values.authorOccupation: Actor, comedian, producer, writer, director, rapper, singer, songwriter

values.authorQuote: I think; therefore I am.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: It is not enough to have a good mind; the main thing is to use it well.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: If you would be a real seeker after truth, it is necessary that at least once in your life you doubt, as far as possible, all things.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: The greatest minds are capable of the greatest vices as well as of the greatest virtues.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Divide each difficulty into as many parts as is feasible and necessary to resolve it.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: It is only prudent never to place complete confidence in that by which we have even once been deceived.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: I am accustomed to sleep and in my dreams to imagine the same things that lunatics imagine when awake.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Perfect numbers like perfect men are very rare.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Common sense is the most fairly distributed thing in the world, for each one thinks he is so well-endowed with it that even those who are hardest to satisfy in all other matters are not in the habit of desiring more of it than they already have.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: The senses deceive from time to time, and it is prudent never to trust wholly those who have deceived us even once.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: A state is better governed which has few laws, and those laws strictly observed.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: An optimist may see a light where there is none, but why must the pessimist always run to blow it out?
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: I hope that posterity will judge me kindly, not only as to the things which I have explained, but also to those which I have intentionally omitted so as to leave to others the pleasure of discovery.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: In order to improve the mind, we ought less to learn, than to contemplate.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Except our own thoughts, there is nothing absolutely in our power.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Whenever anyone has offended me, I try to raise my soul so high that the offense cannot reach it.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: I am indeed amazed when I consider how weak my mind is and how prone to error.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Everything is self-evident.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Nothing is more fairly distributed than common sense: no one thinks he needs more of it than he already has.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: One cannot conceive anything so strange and so implausible that it has not already been said by one philosopher or another.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: The two operations of our understanding, intuition and deduction, on which alone we have said we must rely in the acquisition of knowledge.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Illusory joy is often worth more than genuine sorrow.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Each problem that I solved became a rule, which served afterwards to solve other problems.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: The first precept was never to accept a thing as true until I knew it as such without a single doubt.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: The reading of all good books is like a conversation with the finest minds of past centuries.
values.author: Rene Descartes
values.authorBirthplace: La Haye en Touraine, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: When it is not in our power to follow what is true, we ought to follow what is most probable.
values.author: Rene Descartes

values.authorQuote: Design can never be an ultimate explanation for anything. It can only be a proximate explanation. A plane or a car is explained by a designer but that's because the designer himself, the engineer, is explained by natural selection.

values.authorQuote: I am against religion because it teaches us to be satisfied with not understanding the world.

values.authorQuote: If something is true, no amount of wishful thinking will change it.

values.authorQuote: An Internet meme is a hijacking of the original idea. Instead of mutating by random change and spreading by a form of Darwinian selection, Internet memes are altered deliberately by human creativity. There is no attempt at accuracy of copying, as with genes - and as with memes in their original version.
values.author: Richard Dawkins
